Mixin: hasEmitter

hasEmitter

Mixin for objects that have an Emitter instance. Exposes key Emitter methods, and calls through to this.emitter. This is just for convenience and consistency for objects that have an Emitter.
Source:
  • events/hasemitter.js, line 12

setEmitter(emitter, emitterEvents) → {undefined}

Sets an emitter instance on 'this' and optionally binds events from the emitter to methods on 'this' using the emitterEvents hash arguments
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
emitter Object | Emitter Emitter instance or options
emitterEvents Object <nullable>
 hash of event names to method names, for which to bind to on the emitter.
